function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of fake news creating panic and anxiety","Impact":"Increased fear, anxiety, and mental health problems among the public","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns to promote critical thinking and media literacy, fact-checking of news sources","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, social media algorithms for identifying and flagging fake news","People":"General public","Owner":"Government health departments, media organizations, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Social media use leading to anxiety and psychological problems","Impact":"Fear of missing out, public vulnerability, and emotional issues such as anxiety and depression","Mitigation":"Promotion of healthy social media usage, mental health support, and awareness of psychological impacts","Technologies":"Mental health apps, social media usage trackers, online counseling platforms","People":"Social media users","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals, social media platforms"}]}
